greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Integer values of the Proper Divisor balance.
comment: 1 and all primes have Proper Divisor balance 0. These values are not included in this list.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..267
formula: Proper Divisor balance of n = sum_{1 < d < n and divides n} {d / phi(d)} where phi is Euler's phi function.
xref: Cf. A023898, A023899 for the versions with all divisors included.
results.author: _Olivier Gérard_, Mar 29 2014
